description: [``botocore``] This release adds document support to Converse and ConverseStream APIs
[``botocore``] Add support for the Cargo package format.
[``botocore``] This release enables AWS Compute Optimizer to analyze and generate optimization recommendations for Amazon RDS MySQL and RDS PostgreSQL.
[``botocore``] This release enables AWS Cost Optimization Hub to show cost optimization recommendations for Amazon RDS MySQL and RDS PostgreSQL.

[``botocore``] Doc-only update for DynamoDB. Fixed Important note in 6 Global table APIs - CreateGlobalTable, DescribeGlobalTable, DescribeGlobalTableSettings, ListGlobalTables, UpdateGlobalTable, and UpdateGlobalTableSettings.
[``botocore``] Fix Glue paginators for Jobs, JobRuns, Triggers, Blueprints and Workflows.
[``botocore``] IVS Real-Time now offers customers the ability to record individual stage participants to S3.
[``botocore``] Adds support for model references in Hub service, and adds support for cross-account access of Hubs
